content: During the FHIR DevDays in Amsterdam we have a session which focuses on FHIR Tools and Toolkits. We intent to have a few speakers for that slot (each speaker has a brief timslot to make a pitch). Grahame will be one of the speakers. We still have two open 7-minute slots for tool-related pitches, please contact me via Private Message should you wish to present your tool/toolkit.
